articles.author: India Today Sports Desk
articles.title: Kris Srikkanth slams Indian selectors for picking KL Rahul in Asia Cup squad: Don't select him if he is unfit - India Today
articles.description: Former Indian opener Kris Srikkanth lambasted the Indian selection panel for including KL Rahul in the Asia Cup squad, saying that if a player is not fit, he should be not selected.
articles.content: Former Indian opener Kris Srikkanth has slammed the Indian selection panel for selecting an unfit KL Rahul in their 17-man squad for the upcoming Asia Cup 2023. Ajit Agarkar, the chairperson of selec… [+2892 chars]
